titles.title: O Lord, You have been good,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Lord, You have been good,
You have been faithful to all generations.
O Lord, Your steadfast love and tender mercy
Have been our salvation.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For by Your hand we have been fed,
And by Your Spirit we have been led.
O Lord, You have been good,
You have been faithful to all generations.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For by Your hand we have been fed,
And by Your Spirit we have been led.
O Lord, Almighty God,
Father unchanging, upright and holy.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O Lord, You have been good, You have been faithful,
You have been good, You have been good,
You have been faithful,You have been good.
